vote.title: Authorize (1) the acceptance of funds from Dallas Education Foundation in the amount of $800,000.00 for the purposes of building, restoring and renovating the concession and restroom buildings at Reverchon Park Baseball Field; (2) the receipt and deposit of funds in an amount not to exceed $800,000.00 in the Capital Gifts, Donations, and Development Fund; (3) an increase in appropriations in the amount of $800,000.00 in the Capital Gifts, Donations, and Development Fund; and (4) the disbursement of funds in an amount not to exceed $800,000.00 from the Capital Gifts, Donation, and Development Fund - Not to exceed $800,000.00 - Financing: Capital Gifts, Donation, and Development Fund
vote.description: Authorize (1) the acceptance of funds from Dallas Education Foundation in the amount of $800,000.00 for the purposes of building, restoring and renovating the concession and restroom buildings at Reverchon Park Baseball Field; (2) the receipt and deposit of funds in an amount not to exceed $800,000.00 in the Capital Gifts, Donations, and Development Fund; (3) an increase in appropriations in the amount of $800,000.00 in the Capital Gifts, Donations, and Development Fund; and (4) the disbursement of funds in an amount not to exceed $800,000.00 from the Capital Gifts, Donation, and Development Fund - Not to exceed $800,000.00 - Financing: Capital Gifts, Donation, and Development Fund
